GroupInfo.title: Allternatives for some duration tests
GroupInfo.description: This group of tests stand in for the originals in the conformance suite. These originals all use fractional components in the duration specification such as P1.5Y and PHP does not support such fractional components. The tests at least make sure that any other relevant parameters tested by the originals are tested.

test-case.Creator: Bill Seddon
test-case.name: L-DayTimeDurationAdd-1
test-case.description: Simple test of adding an xs:dayTimeDuration with PT0S.

test-case.Creator: Bill Seddon
test-case.name: L-DayTimeDurationAdd-2
test-case.description: Simple test of substraction PT0S with an xs:dayTimeDuration.

test-case.Creator: Bill Seddon
test-case.name: L-DayTimeDurationAdd-3
test-case.description: Simple test of adding two arbitrary xs:yearMonthDurations.

test-case.Creator: Bill Seddon
test-case.name: L-DayTimeDurationSubtract-1
test-case.description: Simple test of substraction an xs:dayTimeDuration with PT0S.

test-case.Creator: Bill Seddon
test-case.name: L-DayTimeDurationSubtract-2
test-case.description: Simple test of substraction PT0S with an xs:dayTimeDuration.

test-case.Creator: Bill Seddon
test-case.name: L-DayTimeDurationSubtract-3
test-case.description: Simple test of substraction two arbitrary xs:dayTimeDurations.

test-case.Creator: Bill Seddon

test-case.name: L-DayTimeDurationMultiply-8
